channel.title: Recommendations on EarthCube Software Citation
channel.description: Recent content in Recommendations on EarthCube Software Citation

item.title: For Software Developers
item.description: SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS Create a persistent web identifier (such as a Digital Object Identifier (DOI)) for your software. Three potential ways to get a persistent identifier are as follows: Provide clear acknowledgement instructions and place this language in the appropriate files and webpages. Provide a license with your software.

item.title: For Software Users
item.description: SOFTWARE USERS Cite the software you use, whether created by you or somebody else Use a consistent set of information in your software citations ESIP Example Citation GuidelineAuthor. (Publication Year). Title. Version No. Publisher. PID URL. Access Date.
